short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pizzazz is a web extension that enhances the Piazza interface

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pizzazz is a Piazza improvement extension, which will hopefully soon improve the Piazza UI somewhat.

For right now, the only feature is allowing you to change the preset colors in the color selection dropdown menu.
